item.title: 独家消息消息人士称拜登将因与俄罗斯的关系禁止在美国销售卡巴斯基软件
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士称，拜登政府将于周四宣布禁止在美国销售卡巴斯基实验室的杀毒软件的计划，并列举了该公司在美国的大客户，包括关键基础设施提供商以及州和地方政府。【原文：The Biden administration on Thursday will announce plans to bar the sale of Kaspersky Lab's antivirus software in the United States, a person familiar with the matter said, citing the firm's large U.S. customers including critical infrastructure providers and state and local governments.】

item.title: Castlelake 将从 Upstart 收购高达 12 亿美元的消费贷款
item.description: 私人信用贷款公司 Castlelake 周四表示，将从金融科技公司 Upstart 收购高达 12 亿美元的消费分期贷款，以扩大其在零售贷款领域的立足点。【原文：Private credit lender Castlelake will buy up to $1.2 billion in consumer installment loans from fintech firm Upstart to expand its foothold in the retail lending space, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于杂货需求稳定，克罗格第一季度同店销售额超出预期
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger）周四的季度同店销售额超出华尔街预期，这得益于更多顾客涌入其门店购买价格较低的食品杂货，因为通胀严重制约了家庭预算。【原文：Kroger beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly same-store sales on Thursday, benefiting from more customers thronging to its outlets for lower-priced groceries as sticky inflation stretches household budgets.】

item.title: PayPal 聘请沃尔玛高管担任首席技术官，推动人工智能发展
item.description: PayPal 周四告诉路透社，该公司已聘请沃尔玛的一位顶级技术高管 Srini Venkatesan 担任新的首席技术官，负责公司在人工智能领域的推进工作。【原文：PayPal has hired one of Walmart's top tech executives Srini Venkatesan to head up the company's push into artificial intelligence as its new chief technology officer, the company told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 英伟达将巩固全球最有价值公司地位
item.description: 在合作伙伴戴尔公司和超微计算机公司收到埃隆-马斯克的人工智能初创公司的服务器订单后，英伟达股价在周四收盘前上涨了 3%，将扩大这家半导体风向标公司作为全球最有价值公司的领先地位。【原文：Nvidia shares gained 3% before the bell on Thursday, set to extend the semiconductor bellwether's lead as the world's most valuable company, after partners Dell and Super Micro Computer received server orders for Elon Musk's AI startup.】

item.title: 英格兰银行在英国大选前将利率维持在 5.25
item.description: 戴维-米利肯和苏班-阿卜杜拉报道【原文：By David Milliken and Suban Abdulla】

item.title: 埃森哲预测 2024 年收入增长将高于预期，原因是人工智能需求旺盛
item.description: IT 服务提供商埃森哲周四预计，由于人工智能应用的不断增长抵消了企业支出增长的疲软，该公司的年收入增长将在很大程度上高于预期，从而使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 3%。【原文：IT services provider Accenture projected annual revenue growth largely above estimates on Thursday, as growing adoption of artificial intelligence offsets sluggish growth in enterprise spending, sending its shares up 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：霍尼韦尔斥资 20 亿美元收购航空航天与国防公司 CAES Systems
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，霍尼韦尔已同意以约 20 亿美元的价格从私募股权公司 Advent International 手中收购航空航天与国防技术公司 CAES Systems。【原文：Honeywell has agreed to buy aerospace and defense technology company CAES Systems for roughly $2 billion from private equity firm Advent International, The Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 文件显示，丰田集团供应商电装和爱信缩减交叉持股规模
item.description: 周四的监管文件显示，丰田的两家顶级供应商电装（Denso）和爱信（Aisin）已经出售了在多家丰田关联公司中的持股，这是该庞大汽车集团交叉持股的最新一次减持。【原文：Two of Toyota's top suppliers, Denso and Aisin, have sold off holdings in several Toyota-affiliated companies, regulatory filings showed on Thursday, in the latest reduction of cross-shareholding across the sprawling automotive group.】

item.title: 德国因 "胖手指 "故障对花旗集团处以罚款
item.description: 德国银行监管机构周四表示，花旗集团因交易系统控制失误被处以近 1300 万欧元（约合 1394 万美元）的罚款，这是该机构消费者保护部门做出的有史以来最大的处罚。【原文：Germany has fined Citigroup nearly 13 million euros ($13.94 million) for lapses in its trading system controls, the nation's bank regulator said on Thursday, as its consumer protection division imposed its largest penalty ever.】

item.title: 美国股市上涨，瑞士再次降息，英国央行受到关注；人民币下滑
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: Joby Aviation 称 FAA 批准为空中出租车运营开发内部软件
item.description: Joby Aviation 周四表示，美国航空监管机构已授权使用这家空中出租车制造商的内部软件来执行管理飞行员工作量和匹配乘客与飞机等任务，类似于打车应用。【原文：Joby Aviation said on Thursday the U.S. aviation regulator has authorized the use of the air-taxi maker's in-house software to perform tasks such as managing pilot workload and matching passengers with aircraft similar to ride-hailing apps.】

item.title: 独家报道美国监管机构在是否发布新的银行资本上调草案问题上意见不一
item.description: 五位熟悉内情的人士表示，美国银行监管机构正在就放宽银行资本上调规则的前进道路争论不休，在华尔街的强烈反对下，一些监管机构希望华尔街能提供更多反馈意见。【原文：U.S. bank regulators are arguing over the path forward for rules easing bank capital hikes, with some wanting to allow additional feedback from Wall Street after the industry vigorously pushed back, said five people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 食品公司小心翼翼地涉足减肥领域
item.description: 雀巢公司的一位高管告诉路透社记者，雀巢为服用减肥药（如维格维）的人推出的新食品品牌将注明餐食含有高蛋白、高纤维和高营养成分，但不会点出这些特效药的名称。【原文：Nestle's new food brand for people taking weight-loss drugs like Wegovy will note that the meals are high in protein, fiber and nutrients, but will not name the blockbuster medications, a company executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 标普、纳斯达克期货攀升，英伟达延续涨势
item.description: 纳斯达克和 S&P 500 指数期货周四跳涨，原因是英伟达（Nvidia）延续涨势，而结束六一节假期归来的投资者则在等待经济数据和美联储官员的评论，以坚定对今年降息的押注。【原文：Nasdaq and S&P 500 futures jumped on Thursday as Nvidia extended its rally while investors returning from the Juneteenth holiday waited for economic data and commentary from Federal Reserve officials to firm up bets on interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 环保活动人士赢得对英国油井计划具有里程碑意义的裁决
item.description: 英国最高法院周四裁定，地方当局在批准陆上油井的规划许可时，本应考虑其对气候的长期影响，这一裁决可能会对未来的化石燃料开发产生巨大影响。【原文：A local authority should have considered the long-term climate impact of onshore oil wells when it granted them planning permission, the UK Supreme Court ruled on Thursday in a decision that could hugely impact any future fossil fuel developments.】

item.title: 中国重要全会旨在解决数十年来的税收失衡问题
item.description: 政策顾问们表示，长期以来一直被吹嘘的中国税收制度改革将侧重于允许地方政府保留更多的财政收入，市场普遍认为这是消除对金融稳定的直接威胁的重要一步。【原文：Long-touted changes to China's tax system will focus on allowing local governments to retain more fiscal revenues, say policy advisers, widely seen by markets as an important step towards removing an immediate threat to financial stability.】

item.title: 图片报》报道：西门子因缺陷停止向德国交付列车
item.description: 据《图片报》周四报道，由于某些部件存在质量问题，德国企业集团西门子已停止向德国铁路运营商交付新的高速 ICE 列车。【原文：German conglomerate Siemens has stopped delivering new fast-speed ICE trains to rail operator Deutsche Bahn due to quality problems in some components, Bild daily reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国称欧盟电动汽车调查要求提供的信息 "史无前例
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，欧盟为调查中国新能源汽车所要求的信息种类、范围和数量都是 "前所未有的"。【原文：The types, scope and quantity of information requested by the European Union for the investigation into Chinese new energy vehicles were "unprecedented", China's commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 丰田因零部件短缺停止 6 条生产线
item.description: 丰田汽车公司表示，由于零部件短缺，从周四起将停止日本五家工厂的六条生产线。【原文：Toyota Motor said it would halt six production lines at five plants in Japan from Thursday due to a parts shortage.】

item.title: 花旗集团地区首席执行官表示，尽管政治局势不确定，但花旗仍将赌注押在欧洲
item.description: 花旗集团新任欧洲地区主管伊格纳西奥-古铁雷斯-奥兰蒂亚（Ignacio Gutierrez-Orrantia）在接受路透社采访时表示，尽管欧洲大陆的政治不稳定令投资者感到不安，但花旗集团仍希望促进其在欧洲的业务。【原文：Citigroup is looking to boost its business in Europe despite political instability on the continent spooking investors, the bank's new head of the region Ignacio Gutierrez-Orrantia said in an interview with Reuters.】

item.title: 英国大选前英国央行将维持利率在 16 年高位
item.description: 由于潜在通胀压力持续存在，英国央行周四看来将把利率维持在 5.25% 的 16 年高位，这将使首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）无法在 7 月 4 日大选前获得急需的推动力。【原文：Britain's central bank looks on course to hold interest rates at a 16-year high of 5.25% on Thursday as underlying inflation pressures prove persistent, depriving Prime Minister Rishi Sunak of a much-needed boost ahead of a July 4 election.】

item.title: Energean 拟以高达 9.45 亿美元的价格向凯雷出售地中海油气资产
item.description: 这家专注于地中海地区的石油和天然气生产商周四表示，Energean 已同意将其在埃及、意大利和克罗地亚的资产出售给私募股权基金凯雷（Carlyle），出售价格高达 9.45 亿美元。【原文：Energean has agreed to sell its assets in Egypt, Italy and Croatia to private equity fund Carlyle for up to $945 million, the Mediterranean-focused oil and gas producer said on Thursday.】

item.title: 业内人士称，由于德国需求下滑，5 月份欧盟电动汽车销量下降
item.description: 欧洲汽车行业机构周四公布的数据显示，5月份欧盟新电池电动汽车的销量同比下降了12%，其中德国的销量同比下降了30%。【原文：Sales of new battery-electric cars in the European Union dropped 12% in May from a year earlier, led by a 30% plunge in Germany, data from Europe's auto industry body showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 聚焦：欧盟芯片制造计划陷入困境，Wolfspeed 工厂推迟投产
item.description: Wolfspeed 公司推迟了在德国建造一座耗资 30 亿美元的工厂的计划，这凸显了欧盟为提高半导体产量和减少对亚洲芯片的依赖所做的努力。【原文：Wolfspeed has delayed plans to build a $3 billion plant in Germany, highlighting the European Union's struggle to increase semiconductor production and reduce its reliance on Asian chips.】

item.title: 中国的倾销调查是对西班牙猪农应变能力的又一次考验
item.description: 本周，中国对欧盟进口猪肉进行倾销调查，继而对中国电动汽车征收关税，这让西班牙的养猪户们措手不及，但养猪业已经证明了它的韧性，远没有欧盟的汽车业那么脆弱。【原文：China's dumping probe into EU pork imports following duties slapped on Chinese EVs, caught Spain's pig farmers on the hop this week, but the sector has proved it is resilient and far less vulnerable than the bloc's car industry.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国命令小型银行减少理财业务
item.description: 三位知情人士告诉路透社，为遏制金融风险，中国银行业监管机构已要求小型银行在 2026 年之前停止销售理财产品，除非它们拥有独立的理财子公司。【原文：China's banking regulator has given small banks a 2026 deadline to stop selling wealth management products unless they have a separate wealth subsidiary in a bid to curb financial risks, three people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 腾讯《地下城与勇士》游戏从部分安卓应用商店下架
item.description: 腾讯公司表示，由于其热门手机游戏《地下城与勇士》（DnF Mobile）的合同已到期，该公司将于本周四从部分安卓应用商店下架该游戏。【原文：Tencent is removing from Thursday its hit mobile game "Dungeon & Fighter" (DnF Mobile) from selected Android app stores as its contracts have expired, the company said.】

item.title: 股东警告新日铁收购美国钢铁公司将面临更高的脱碳成本
item.description: 一个激进的股东组织表示，新日铁对美国钢铁公司的拟议收购有可能增加日本第一大钢铁制造商的脱碳成本，并敦促该公司解决收购对其气候目标的影响。【原文：Nippon Steel's proposed acquisition of U.S. Steel risks raising decarbonisation costs for Japan's top steelmaker, an activist shareholder group said, urging the company to address the takeover's impact on its climate goals.】

item.title: 加拿大西捷航空公司称工会撤销罢工通知
item.description: 加拿大西捷航空公司（WestJet）周四表示，在代表其维修工程师的工会撤销罢工通知并表示将重返谈判桌后，该公司正在努力恢复正常运营。【原文：Canadian airline WestJet said on Thursday it is working to resume normal operations after the union representing its maintenance engineers rescinded its strike notice and said it would return to the bargaining table.】
